title: module_home-properties_schema
description: schema des propriétés du module home

avatar.description: image centrale correspondant à une photo de profil

alt.description: texte à afficher si l'image est introuvable

background.description: propriétés du fond animé de la libraire particlesjs

color.description: Color of particles and connecting lines

minDistance.description: Distance in px for conntecting lines

connectParticles.description: true/false if connecting lines should be drawn

typewriter.description: propriétés de la librairie type ReactRotatingText

items.description: The array of strings to be cycled through

cursor.description: If set to true, it will display the cursor after the text.

pause.description: The number of milliseconds to pause after the text has just finished being typed out.

emptyPause.description: The number of milliseconds to pause while no text is being displayed (i.e. after deleting has just finished).

typingInterval.description: The number of milliseconds between each typing action.

deletingInterval.description: The number of milliseconds between each deleting action.
